segments.text: So that will be one teddy , two terry cloth robes , three pairs of satin slippers , and two pairs of pajamas .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does all that come to 10,000 NT ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see ... yes , 15,880 NT . After the discount , your total comes to 12,704 NT . Here's your free teddy bear , free panties and your card application .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right here . And write your address . You'll get the card in the mail within a week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know your friend will like the gift set , especially the teddy bear .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the teddy bear is for me !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Remember to keep your receipt in case your friend needs to make any exchanges . There are no refunds on sale items .
segments.speaker: S1
